name: Automated Carousell AlertingÂ System (Python)
description: Check for listings, scrapes new listings automatically and alerts you on Telegram

PAGE.description: Carousell Page URL to monitor. Search for a page, sort by Recent listings. The URL should end with descending

RESELLERS.description: [OPTIONAL] Seller usernames you want to filter away. Separated by a comma and space.

BOT_TOKEN.description: Telegram Bot Token. Take note there is a colon in between Telegram token.

BOT_CHATID.description: Telegram Chat to receive alerts. Depending on whether you created a group or a channel, minus sign might or might not be part of chat_id.

SLEEP_TIME.description: Refreshes every 5 minute. Change 5 to adjust the duration of poll. It MUST be in this format. Please poll responsibly as we do not want to flood Carousell servers!
